messages.content: Who played the role of Charles Bronson (the British prisoner), and in which film?
The role of Charles Bronson was played by actor Robert Shaw in the film "The Deadly Affair" (1967).
Name one film with Robert DeNiro and Al Pacino.
Name two films with Sylvester Stallone and Dolph Lundgren.
Have James Coburn and Yul Brynner ever played together in a film?
Yes, James Coburn and Yul Brynner have both appeared in the film "The Magnificent Seven" (1960). Coburn played the character of "Red" and Brynner played the character of "The Marshal".
